title: We Tried Everything From KKW Beauty—Here's What's Worth the Money
text: NIGEL: It seems all of our media and politicians have overlooked, or deliberately ignored, a very important point. When we voted to leave it seems very clear to me that it was the political union that we were voting to leave, not any 'free' (It never has been, or will be, 'free'!) trading agreement. The EU frequently boasts of the 'wonderful' trade agreements it has made, painfully slowly, throughout the world over the years. We effectively already have a trade agreement in place, beneficial to both parties and been in place for nearly fifty years - So, frankly, this farce is nothing more than a smokescreen to keep us in a political union that we were never asked if we wanted in the first place!
